statements: UPDATE trades SET profit = 1000 WHERE trade_id = 1;
UPDATE trades SET profit = -500, exit_price = 25.50 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE trades SET exit_price = 150.75, profit = exit_price - entry_price WHERE trade_id = 100
UPDATE trades SET exit_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00', profit = exit_price - entry_price WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
UPDATE historical_price_movements SET open_price = 1500, close_price = 1520 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_strength = 'Strong' WHERE pattern_id = 10;
UPDATE historical_price_movements SET open_price = 150.25, high_price = 155.75, low_price = 148.50, close_price = 152.30 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_strength = 'High', last_updated = '2022-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND pattern_name = 'Double Top Pattern';
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_name = 'Head and Shoulders' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trading_opportunities SET risk_level = 'Low' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE trading_patterns SET pattern_name = 'Double Top', entry_price = 1500.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE price_movements SET price = 1200.75, volume = 5000 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND timestamp = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE PriceMovements SET open_price = 100.50, high_price = 105.75 WHERE price_id = 1234;
UPDATE TradingSignals SET buy_sell = 'SELL', signal_strength = 0.75 WHERE signal_id = 5678;
UPDATE PriceMovements SET open_price = 50.75, close_price = 51.20 WHERE price_id = 1001;
UPDATE TradingOpportunities SET profit = 1250.00, strategy_name = 'Trend Following' WHERE profit < 1000;
UPDATE HistoricalPriceData SET close_price = 200 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE TradingOpportunities SET opportunity_description = 'Short-term opportunity' WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE HistoricalPriceData SET open_price = 50.25, close_price = 52.10 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price_date = '2022-01-10';
UPDATE MarketParticipants SET location = 'New York' WHERE participant_name = 'John Smith';
